thread.title: Demi Lovato opens up about Oregon mass shooting
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato opens up about Oregon mass shooting | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Demi Lovato opens up about Oregon mass shooting
text:
Other Articles Are you running the right way? Nick Gordon now accused of injecting Bobbi Kristina with toxic mixture IRCTC rolls out tour package through Golden Triangle by 3 Shatabdi trains; check out irctctourism.com Demi Lovato, who has always been vocal about her personal issues, recently opened up about the mass shooting at Oregon’s Umpqua Community College.
The 23-year-old songstress explained that she is fed up with the public rushing to conclusions about the shooter’s mental well-being, reports E! Online.
The ‘Heart Attack’ hit-maker added that she has seen several instances where mental health has been brought to attention by the media because of these tragedies.
Lovato further said that she thinks that it is really important to remember that people with mental illness are actually more likely to inflict harm on themselves and become the victim rather than be the perpetrators.
 06, 2015 5:24 pm
